TEXT.TITLE: HEALTHVEST <HVT> BUYS TENNESSEE MEDICAL COMPLEX
TEXT.BODY: Healthvest said it acquired the Eastwood Hospital medical complex in Memphis from Healthcare International Inc for 50 mln dlrs cash. Healthcare International will continue to operate the hospital under a lease agreement, the company said. Reuter
